titles: At Edinburgh the fifth day of February, one thousand six hundred fourty and nine years.
author: Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.
publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty [i.e. s.n.],
notes: At head of text: engraving of royal seal, and "God save the King."

Proclaiming Charles II King of Great Britain, France, and Ireland. He is to give satisfaction by taking the Covenant. This to be printed and proclaimed. A London reprint of [Steele III] No. 2005, with Tyler's Edinburgh imprint -- Cf. Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Charles --  II, --  King of England, 1630-1685 --  Early works to 1800.
